article_title: J.P. Morgan Nears Deal for Buyout Arm
article_text:
J.P. Morgan Chase & Co. is nearing a deal to sell half its stake in the portfolio of its buyout arm, One Equity Partners, according to people familiar with the matter, as the bank pares down to focus on core businesses.

J.P. Morgan is in advanced discussions with investment firms Lexington Partners LP, which is leading the acquisition, and Carlyle Group LP's AlpInvest Partners unit, to sell them half of the roughly $4.5 billion...
